data.name: OpenAuth Simulator
data.operatingSystem: Linux 路 macOS 路 Windows
data.description: Deterministic HOTP, TOTP, OCRA, EMV/CAP, FIDO2/WebAuthn, and EUDIW OpenID4VP simulators with CLI, REST, UI, Native Java, and MCP facades for IAM testing.

data.name: Use HOTP from Java
data.description: Step-by-step HOTP evaluation via the Native Java facade (HotpEvaluationApplicationService) with stored presets and inline inputs.

data.name: Use TOTP from Java
data.description: RFC 6238-compliant TOTP evaluation instructions covering stored credentials, inline execution, and validation window tuning.

data.name: Use OCRA from Java
data.description: Guidance for exercising deterministic OCRA challenges and responses from in-process Java tests and tools.

data.name: Use EMV/CAP from Java
data.description: Demonstrates Identify, Respond, and Sign flows through EmvCapEvaluationApplicationService with fixture-backed traces.

data.name: Use FIDO2/WebAuthn from Java
data.description: Explains how to evaluate WebAuthn assertions via WebAuthnEvaluationApplicationService with deterministic fixtures.

data.name: Use EUDIW OpenID4VP from Java
data.description: Covers wallet simulation and validation helpers for HAIP-aligned OpenID4VP flows.

data.name: ReadMe.LLM
data.description: LLM-oriented overview describing Native Java seams, canonical entry points, and context-packing guidance.

data.name: llms.txt
data.description: Manifest of high-signal simulator specs and docs for LLM context windows.

data.name: OpenAuth Simulator MCP Proxy
data.operatingSystem: Linux 路 macOS 路 Windows
data.description: REST-backed Model Context Protocol proxy exposing simulator tools (hotp/totp/ocra/emv/fido2/eudiw) for agent workflows.
